Class ec.encoding.EncodedObject 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.encoding.EncodedObject
public class EncodedObject
extends Object
This is the holder for the encoded form of an object. It is the kind of thing returned by Encodable.encode(). See that class for more details.

See Also:
Encodable

EncodedObject(Decoder, Object[], Object[])
Construct an EncodedObject with the given decoder, preface args and body args.

getBodyArgs()
Get the body args.
getDecoder()
Get the decoder.
getPrefaceArgs()
Get the preface args.

EncodedObject 
 public EncodedObject(Decoder theDecoder,
                      Object thePreface[],
                      Object theBody[])
Construct an EncodedObject with the given decoder, preface args and body args.

Parameters:
theDecoder - the Decoder of the encoded object
thePreface - nullOk; the preface args
theBody - nullOk; the body args

getDecoder 
 public Decoder getDecoder()

Returns:
the decoder

the preface args
